newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT-IDX Systems started as buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-IDX Systems started as buy.

text.p: -- Vector Securities International Inc said Monday it initiated coverage of IDX Systems Corp with a buy rating. The company manages large group physician healthcare practices.
-- Vector analyst Benjamin M.W. Rooks in a report forecasts top-line growth for the company of 20 percent and bottom-line growth in the 25 to 30 percent range over the next two years.
-- Rooks said a flurry of new product development, strategic alliances and acquisitions have positioned the company for sustained growth. Its 1997 earnings per share estimate is $0.89.
